reqs:
Pre-reqs: MUSC 311.
15 seats reserved for BMUS - GSSM or GSEM or COMP majors. All other interested students must register for the paper waiting list by fill out this form: http://som.sites.olt.ubc.ca/files/2013/06/2015Wconductingwaitlistform.pdf From the waiting list, a limited number of MM, BMUS, and BA majors may be granted permission to register, but space is limited. A few non-music students may also be given permission to register in order to obtain this pre-requisite for the Bachelor of Education program.
description: The relation of conducting gestures to choral sound; development of practical skills in directing ensembles and reading scores; attendant issues of vocal technique and pedagogy.
